title: Mobile Microlearning Strategies for Enhancing Online Learning Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage skills and online learning experience
context.additional_context: A smartphone-based language learning course designed for environments without PC access.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize basic functions of online learning tools (apps, platforms) with 90% accuracy within two weeks.
Learners can achieve weekly learning goals at 80% or higher based on their technological self-efficacy
Learners can improve language (basic vocabulary/grammar) proficiency by 20% using 15-minute microlearning content in mobile environments
Learners can periodically diagnose their learning effectiveness through formative assessments and develop improvement plans

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
